participant_1.background:
I play with my dogs to help me feel younger.
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
My appearance is not as important to me as my performance.
I would like to spend more time with my family, but I have been very busy with my show.
i have four cats.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to jazz music when I make my own coffee.
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
i take care of my mother and father.
i once wrote a biography of my favorite actor.
my favorite movie is titanic.

content.text: Hi there, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you today?
I'm doing great! I'm just hanging out with my cats.
Oh, that sounds nice! I'm just getting ready to make some coffee.
What kind of coffee do you like?
I like to make my own coffee, and I usually listen to jazz music while I do it.
That sounds really relaxing. I'm not much of a coffee drinker, but I do enjoy jazz music.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you have any favorite movies?
I do! I love the movie Titanic.
That's a great movie! I once wrote a biography of my favorite actor, who was in that movie.
That's awesome! I'm sure it was a great biography.
Thanks! It was a lot of fun to write.
I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Me too! What else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, and I also like to play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time with my family and friends too, and I also like to read books.
That's cool! I used to read a lot when I was younger, but I haven't had much time for it lately.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find time to read when you have a lot going on.
Yeah, it is. But I'm trying to make more time for it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
I hope so!
Me too!
Thanks for talking to me!
You're welcome
